timeline.bodyText:
this is counting how many scopes this controller instance has created so far.. right?
if the intention for this metrics is to be per controller instance, then this seems fine, but if it reports a value, then two different controller instances could report different values.
timeline.author: shiveshr

replies.bodyText: The values from multiple Controllers will be aggregated at the InfluxDB level when collecting the metrics.
replies.author: RaulGracia
